parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
(a) there, yonder, in that place, (b) thither, there. Of uncertain affinity; there; by extension, thither.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
From asthenes; feebleness; by implication, malady; morally, frailty.
Thirty. The decade of treis; thirty.
A year. Apparently a primary word; a year.
